title: Your children's eyes
creator_credit: Realist Films, John Taylor and Alex Strasser
brief_description: The physiology of the eye, how the eye works and the causes of long and short sight, and diseases of the eyes and their cures, form the three parts of this excellent film.
creator_credit_for_label: Realist Films, John Taylor and Alex Strasser
